ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Re: RE: Class balance
ygData.msgSnippet: How about Deadbard?  wait that would be too confusing with my usual nickname in the guild, Oh look, here comes that Deadbard guy again, shall we invite him in
ygData.messageBody:
How about Deadbard? wait that would be too confusing with my usual nickname
in the guild, "Oh look, here comes that Deadbard guy again, shall we invite
him in as another meat shield?"

Kit

Help me think of a k3wl name.

[48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
